sentence.Network_en: Famine hit that benighted country once more.
sentence.Network_cn: 饥荒再次席卷了那个蒙昧的国家。

sentence.Network_en: Listen to both sides and you will be enlightened , heed only one side and you will be benighted.
In the benighted Middle Ages, intellectual curiosity was discouraged by the authorities.
sentence.Network_cn: 在中世纪这个黑暗的年代里, 求知欲全给统治阶级扼杀了.

list.abs: Last year Myanmar ' s benighted people were forced to endorse a dwifungsi constitution a referendum ., 去年 , 缅甸愚昧的人民在全民选票中被迫赞同通过规定军队具有双重职能的宪法.

many Americans would like the withdrawal of combat troops from Iraq to signal the beginning of the end of America's overall embroilment in the benighted regions of the world .很多美国人喜欢用作战部队从伊拉克撤离来表明美国开始结束全面卷入世界的落后地区。
a rare friend of North Korea and Myanmar , Vietnam could help coax those benighted places out of self-imposed isolation .作为北朝鲜和缅甸少有的朋友，越南可以耐心劝说那些愚蠢的地方从自我孤立中走出来。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (in sense 2): past participle of archaic benight 'cover in the darkness of night, obscure' (see be-, night)

entry.def: If you describe people or the place where they live as benighted, you think they are unfortunate or do not know anything.

example.ex: Famine hit that benighted country once more.
example.tran: 饥荒再次席卷了那个蒙昧的国家。

means.word_mean: 2. lacking enlightenment or knowledge or culture;

sentences.sentence: "a dark age in the history of education"

auth_sentence.content: In the main, it is the ignorant and benighted who breed uncontrollably.
auth_sentence.res_content: In the main, it is the ignorant and benighted who breed uncontrollably.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In the main, it is the ignorant and benighted who breed uncontrollably.

auth_sentence.content: Much like a passage on that poor benighted vessel, it's something that's probably best avoided if at all possible.
auth_sentence.res_content: Much like a passage on that poor benighted vessel, it's something that's probably best avoided if at all possible.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Much like a passage on that poor benighted vessel, it's something that's probably best avoided if at all possible.

auth_sentence.content: French Enlightenment thinkers such Voltaire, Diderot and Montesquieu regarded religion as divisive, benighted and intolerant.
auth_sentence.res_content: French Enlightenment thinkers such Voltaire, Diderot and Montesquieu regarded religion as divisive, benighted and intolerant.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: French Enlightenment thinkers such Voltaire, Diderot and Montesquieu regarded religion as divisive, benighted and intolerant.

sentences.en: benighted ages of barbarism and superstition
